title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using a valid phone number and password through the unified authentication system.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid phone number and corresponding password.
Click on the login button.
Confirm that the user is authenticated and redirected to their role-specific dashboard.
Verify session is initiated and maintained using Supabase session management.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when invalid phone number or password is provided and appropriate error messages appear.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid phone number or incorrect password.
Click on the login button.
Confirm that login is rejected.
Verify that an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.
Ensure no session is created after failed login attempt.

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that after login, users only have access to functionalities and dashboard views specific to their assigned role.

steps.description: Log in as a user with the role of Employee.
Confirm that the employee dashboard is displayed.
Attempt to access admin-only pages and verify access is denied.
Log out, then log in as a user with Admin role.
Confirm that the admin dashboard and admin features are accessible.
Ensure employee-only pages are not accessible beyond their role permissions.

title: Employee KPI Tracking and Performance Leaderboard Accuracy
description: Validate that employees’ KPIs are tracked correctly, performance data is updated in real-time, and leaderboard rankings reflect accurate calculations monthly.

steps.description: Log in as an employee.
View the KPI dashboard and verify KPI metrics match recorded performance data.
Update employee performance data through the scoring interface.
Verify that changes reflect immediately on KPI dashboard and the leaderboard.
Check leaderboard rankings to ensure correct order according to KPI scores.

title: Comprehensive Client Management CRUD Operations
description: Ensure client information can be created, viewed, updated, and deleted through the client management modules without errors.

steps.description: Log in as a manager or admin.
Open the client onboarding form and create a new client with valid data.
Confirm the client appears in the client directory.
Edit client details and save the changes.
Verify that client information is updated correctly in all relevant views.
Delete the client entry from the system.
Confirm the client record is removed from all directories and dashboards.

title: Employee Management Including Onboarding and Performance Reviews
description: Validate the employee onboarding process, directory updates, and performance review entries function correctly with proper validations.

steps.description: Log in as an admin or manager.
Access the employee onboarding form and register a new employee with all required details.
Verify the new employee appears in the employee directory.
Perform a performance review entry for the employee.
Confirm the review is saved and visible in employee performance views.
Edit employee details and save.
Ensure updates are reflected immediately across all relevant views.

title: SEO Module Data Entry and Reporting Functionality
description: Test that SEO team members can enter SEO data accurately, generate reports, and appraisals are calculated and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Log in as an SEO team member.
Open the SEO data entry form and submit valid SEO metrics.
Verify the data is saved and visible in the SEO reporting dashboard.
Generate an SEO appraisal report.
Confirm that appraisal scores reflect entered data accurately.

title: Reporting System Generates Accurate Monthly and Growth Reports
description: Validate that monthly, growth, and department-specific reports are generated correctly with accurate analytics data.

steps.description: Log in as a manager or admin.
Navigate to the reporting dashboards.
Generate a monthly performance report selecting a specific month.
Verify report data matches actual stored KPID and performance metrics.
Generate a growth report over a defined time period.
Confirm that data trends and growth calculations are accurate.
Generate department-specific analytics.
Validate that analytics data is properly segmented per department.

title: Arcade Gamification Point Earning and Redemption
description: Verify that users can earn and redeem points correctly within the arcade system, and admins can manage point controls effectively.

steps.description: Log in as an employee.
Perform activities eligible for earning arcade points.
Confirm points are added to the user’s arcade point balance.
Redeem points for rewards through the arcade redemption interface.
Validate that points are deducted correctly and reward redemption is processed.
Log in as an admin.
Access the arcade admin panel and adjust point earning and redemption rules.
Verify that rule changes take effect immediately across all users.

title: Session Management and Logout Functionality
description: Validate that user sessions are accurately managed and users can effectively log out, clearing session data securely.

steps.description: Log in successfully as any user.
Confirm session is created and maintained during navigation.
Perform logout action from any dashboard.
Ensure session is terminated and user is redirected to the login page.
Attempt to access any dashboard page without logging in.
Verify that the user is blocked and redirected to login due to no valid session.

title: Frontend Responsiveness Across Supported Devices
description: Verify that the dashboard UI components render correctly and user interactions function seamlessly on various screen sizes and device types.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop web browsers.
Confirm UI components render properly without layout issues.
Access the application on tablet and mobile devices.
Verify responsive layout adjustments occur.
Ensure all interactive elements such as forms, buttons, dropdowns, and navigation menus are fully functional.

title: Error Handling on Invalid Form Submissions
description: Verify that all forms in the system provide proper validation feedback and handle erroneous or incomplete inputs gracefully.

steps.description: Attempt to submit client onboarding, employee onboarding, and SEO data entry forms with missing mandatory fields.
Validate that required field error messages are displayed.
Submit forms with invalid data formats such as phone number or email.
Confirm that format validation errors are shown and submission is blocked.
Submit forms with extremely large inputs or boundary values.
Ensure system handles input gracefully and displays appropriate messages or truncates if necessary.

title: Access Control for Protected API Services
description: Verify that API services related to authentication, scoring, SEO, and attendance enforce role-based access control and handle unauthorized requests properly.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected API endpoints without authentication token.
Confirm the API returns unauthorized error.
Access APIs with user credentials having limited roles trying to perform actions outside their permissions.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error messages are returned.
Access APIs with correct role-based authorization tokens.
Confirm permitted actions succeed with correct data responses.
